content.prompt:
The following list shows the number of video games sold at a game store each day for one week.

15, 43, 50, 39, 22, 16, 20

Which of the following is the best classification of the data in the list?

choices.label: Neither categorical nor quantitative, and neither discrete nor continuous

topic.text: 1.5: Representing a Quantitative Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
